cartoon.name: Doraemon
cartoon.description: Doraemon is a robotic cat from the future who helps Nobita with his problems using gadgets.

cartoon.name: Tom
cartoon.description: Tom is a mischievous cat always trying to catch Jerry, his clever mouse rival.

cartoon.name: Oggy
cartoon.description: Oggy is a kind but lazy cat who faces trouble from the roaches that cause havoc in his house.

cartoon.name: Hattori
cartoon.description: Hattori is a ninja who helps his friends and ensures they don't get into trouble.
